text:
확실히 누가 읽었는지를 알수 없는 상황이라 원고는 매일매일이 불안합니다. 피고는, 피고가 호닷가컨트리클럽으로 보냈었던 메일을 회사 직원이 두명뿐이라고 단정지어 주장하였었지만, 형사 아즈마상이 2023년 3월22일에 피고가 원고가 재직중인 회사 호닷가컨트리클럽에 피고가 보냈던 메일의 사실확인을 조사했었을 당시2023년10월21일까지도,메일은 완전히 삭제되지 않았었던 상태로, 회사의 컴퓨터에는 기록이 보존되어 있었습니다. 따라서 아즈마형사가 피고가 원고가 재직중인 회사에 보냈었던 메일의 내용을 확인했었다는 사실은 조사를 하러갔었던 아즈마형사도 메일을 읽었다는 증거이고,피고가 보냈던 메일을 읽은 사람은 두명이라고 주장했었던 피고의 진술은,피고의 바램이라 뿐 신빙성없이 추측하는 주장일 뿐입니다.
따라서, 몇명이 읽었는지는 확인 불가능으로,원고의 회사생활은 늘 두려움과 늘 불안감에서 회사생활을 하고 있는 상황입니다. 이 것으로 회사 간부들과 얼굴을 마주칠때마다 원고는 눈을 피하게 되고, 같은 장소에 있어야 할때는 아직도 ,여전히 죄송스럽고 수치스러워서 얼굴이 화끈거립니다.
trans:
The plaintiff is anxious every day because he is in a situation where he doesn't know who read it. The defendant had claimed conclusively that there were only two company employees in the mail the defendant had sent to the Hodotga Country Club, but even until October 21, 2023, the time when Detective Azuma sang investigated the fact-finding of the mail that the defendant sent on March 22, 2023 to the Hodadga Country Club, the company where the plaintiff was working, the record was preserved on the company's computer in the status which the email had not been completely deleted. Therefore, the fact that Detective Azuma confirmed the contents of the mail the defendant had sent to the company where the plaintiff was working is evidence that Detective Azuma, who went to investigate, also read the mail and the defendant's statement, which claimed that there were two people who read the mail the defendant sent is only the defendant's wish and  is nothing more than a speculative claim without credibility.
Therefore, it is impossible to confirm how many people read it, and the Plaintiff's company life is always living in fear and anxiety. Because of this, the plaintiff avoids eye contact every time he encounters company executives, and when he has to be in the same place, his face still gets hot because he feels sorry and ashamed.
